member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Alert.OnDismiss
member.summary: The callback that is called when the alert is being dismissed, but not fully dismissed yet.

member.summary: The callback that is called when the alert has completely been dismissed.

member.summary: The template that is used to produce the heading of the alert.

member.summary: The text for your alert heading.
member.remarks: This parameter is ignored if is specified.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Alert.Dismiss
member.summary: Dismisses the alert.
member.remarks: The property must be set to true if you want to invoke this method.
member.exception: The exception that is thrown if the method is called when the property is set to false.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Alert.DismissAsync
member.summary: Dismisses the alert.
member.remarks: The property must be set to true if you want to invoke this method.
member.exception: The exception that is thrown if the method is called when the property is set to false.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Alert.OnDismissedAsync
member.summary: Triggers the callback.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.BootstrapComponentBase.GetColorClassName(System.String,System.Nullable{Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.NamedColor})
member.summary: Generates the class name from the given prefix and colour. The method returns {prefix}-{colour}.
member.param: The prefix (without a dash) for the class name, for instance btn. If the prefix is not specified, the lower case version of the current class name is used.
The colour to create the clas name from.
member.returns: Returns the class name as {prefix}-{color} or null if is null.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.CardGroupType
member.summary: Defines different types for components.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.CardGroupType.Group
member.summary: The default type. Cards in a group of this type have equal width and equal height with no specing in between the cards.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.CardGroupType.Deck
member.summary: Cards in a group of this type have equal width and equal height with a little bit of spacing in between.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.CardGroupType.Columns
member.summary: Cards in a group of this type have equal width, but the height is whatever height each card has. Cards are arranged top to bottom, left to right.

member.summary: The image is positioned to the right of the card.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel
member.summary: A slideshow component for cycling through elements with virtually any kind of content.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.OnSlide
member.summary: Fired when the transition from one slide to another has started, but before it is completed.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.OnSlid
member.summary: Fired when the transition from one slide to another has completed.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.AutoStart
member.summary: Specifies whether the carousel should start automatically when loaded.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.ImageUrls
member.summary: An array of URLs pointing to images to show in the carousel.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.Interval
member.summary: The number of milliseconds each slide should be shown. The default is 5000ms.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.ShowControls
member.summary: Specifies whether to show to controls on the carousel that allows the user to navigate to the next or previous slide.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.ShowIndicators
member.summary: Specifies whether to show an indicator for each slide.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.SlideCount
member.summary: Returns the number of slides currenty loaded into the carousel.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.TransitionType
member.summary: Specifies how to transition from one slide to the other. The default is .

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.CycleAsync
member.summary: Starts cycling through the slides in the carousel.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.GetSlideCountAsync
member.summary: Returns the number of slides currently loaded into the carousel.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.PauseAsync
member.summary: Pauses the cycling of slides. The cycling can still be controlled with the other methods. Start auto cycling again with the method.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.GoToSlideAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the carousel to the given slide.
member.param: The zero-based index of the slide to move to.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.PreviousAsync
member.summary: Moves the carousel to the previous slide. If the carousel is on the first slide, it will move to the last.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.NextAsync
member.summary: Moves the carousel to the next slide. If the carousel is on the last slide, it will move to the first.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Carousel.OnSlideAsync(System.Text.Json.JsonElement)
member.summary: Used internally by JS interop.

member.summary: Used internally by JS interop.

member.summary: Add this class to mark an element as a page item, for use inside of a pagination element.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ClassNames.Paginations.Link
member.summary: Add this class to an element inside of a page item to mark it as a link to another page in the pagination.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ClassNames.Paginations.Large
member.summary: Add this class to a pagination element to make it large.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ClassNames.Paginations.Small
member.summary: Add this class to a pagination element to make it small.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ClassNames.ProgressBars.Progress
member.summary: Add this class mark an element as the outer "shell" of a progress bar.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ClassNames.ProgressBars.ProgressBar
member.summary: Add this class to turn an element into a progress bar. Must be inside of a "progress" element.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ClassNames.ProgressBars.Striped
member.summary: Add this class to make a progress bar striped.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ClassNames.ProgressBars.Animated
member.summary: Add this class to animate the stripes (don't forget to add the "Striped" class!) from right to left.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ComponentSize.Auto
member.summary: Automatic size.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ContainerType.FixedWidth
member.summary: The container has a fixed max width at each breakpoint. The default type of container.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ContainerType.Fluid
member.summary: The container is fluid with a max width of 100%.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ContainerType.SM
member.summary: 100% wide on on SM screen sizes. Fixed width above this breakpoint.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ContainerType.MD
member.summary: 100% wide on on MD screen sizes. Fixed width above this breakpoint.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ContainerType.LG
member.summary: 100% wide on on LG screen sizes. Fixed width above this breakpoint.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ContainerType.XL
member.summary: 100% wide on on XL screen sizes. Fixed width above this breakpoint.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ExtensionMethods.Lines(System.String)
member.summary: Breaks the given input into lines.
member.param: The input string to split up into lines.
member.returns: Returns a collection where each line of text is a separate item.
member.remarks: If is null, an empty collection is returned.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Heading.Display
member.summary: Use this property to specify a different display size for your heading to better visually fit into the overall look and feel.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Heading.IsAnchor
member.summary: Specifies that the heading is also an anchor that you can link to. This requires that the Id property is also set on the heading. An anchor heading will display a link icon when hovered over to indicate that the heading is an anchor.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Heading.Level
member.summary: The heading level.

member.summary: Defines different modes for scaling images.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ImageScaleMode.Fit
member.summary: The image will be resized so that it completely fits within the area specified for the image.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ImageScaleMode.Fill
member.summary: The image will be resized so that it completely fills the area specified for the image. Some cropping may occur.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ListGroupAnchor.Color
member.summary: Setting a color for a ListGroupAnchor will apply a contextual color to the list group item.

member.summary: Defines the interface to be implemented by link types.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Model.ILink.Description
member.summary: The description of the link. This is typically used as tooltip for the link.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Model.ILink.Index
member.summary: Some components use the index to number multiple links in a collection.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Model.ILink.IsActive
member.summary: Specifies whether the link should be marked as active.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Model.ILink.IsDisabled
member.summary: Specifies whether the link is disabled. Disabled links must not be clickable.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Model.ILink.IsStretched
member.summary: Specifies whether the link should be a stretched link.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Model.ILink.OpenInNewTab
member.summary: Specifies whether the link should open in a new tab.

member.summary: The URL to add to the link.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Model.ILink.Text
member.summary: The link text.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Model.Link
member.summary: Represents a basic link that is used by several components.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.NamedColor
member.summary: Defines different named colours supported by Bootstrap.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.NamedColor.Primary
member.summary: The primary colour. This is typically modified to be your brand colour or the main colour you use to make items stand out.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.NamedColor.Secondary
member.summary: The secondary colour is typically used to support the primary colour, like a secondary brand colour or something like that.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.NamedColor.Success
member.summary: The colour that is used to signal that a task has succeeded or to emphasize something positive, like the colour of a Save button.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.NamedColor.Danger
member.summary: The danger colour is used to signal dangerous actions, such as deleting something permanently. The danger colour is also used to bring focus to error messages etc.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.NamedColor.Warning
member.summary: The warning colour is typically used to warn the user about something possibly dangerous.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.NamedColor.Info
member.summary: The colour used for generic informational data.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.NamedColor.Light
member.summary: A generic light colour. The default is a grayscale colour, but can be modified to be a very light version of the colour.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.NamedColor.Dark
member.summary: A generic dark colour. The default is a grayscale colour, but can be modified, for instance to a dark version of the brand colour.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.NamedColor.White
member.summary: White.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.NamedColor.White50
member.summary: 50% white. Not supported by all components.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.NamedColor.Black50
member.summary: 50% black. Not supported by all components.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Pagination
member.summary: The Pagination component allows you to supply a set of links and display a bootstrap pagination bar on the screen.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Pagination.OnCurrentPageChanged
member.summary: Fired when the parameter has changed.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Pagination.CurrentPage
member.summary: The zero-based index of the currently selected page.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Pagination.Size
member.summary: Set the size of the pagination component. Defaults to .

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Pagination.PageCount
member.summary: The number of pages to show.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Pagination.HighlightCurrent
member.summary: Specifies whether to highlight the currently selected page.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Pagination.ShowNavigation
member.summary: Specifies whether to show the Next and Previous navigation controls.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Pagination.NextPageLinkTemplate
member.summary: The template that allows you to customize how the next page link is rendered.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Pagination.NextPageLinkText
member.summary: The text to show in the next page link.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Pagination.PageItemLinkTemplate
member.summary: The template that allows you to customize how a page item link is rendered. The context parameter passed to the template is the zero-based index of the page item to render.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Pagination.PreviousPageLinkTemplate
member.summary: The template that allows you to customize how the previous page link is rendered.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Pagination.PreviousPageLinkText
member.summary: The text to show in the previous page link.

member.summary: Navigates to the given page.
member.param: The zero-based index of the page to navigate to.

member.summary: Navigates to the next page.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Pagination.PreviousAsync
member.summary: Navigates to the previous page.

member.summary: Fires the event.

member.summary: Bootstrap Pagination sizes

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.PaginationSize.Normal
member.summary: The "normal" size for a bootstrap Pagination element. This is the default.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.PaginationSize.Large
member.summary: The "large" size for a bootstrap Pagination element.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.PaginationSize.Small
member.summary: The "small" size for a bootstrap Pagination element.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Progress
member.summary: Wrapper component for ProgressBar components. Use one or more ProgressBar components inside of a Progress component to create a bootstrap progress bar.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ProgressBar
member.summary: The ProgressBar component, when placed inside of a Progress component, defines a bootstrap progress bar or a section of a progress bar if multiple ProgressBar elements are used.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ProgressBar.IsStriped
member.summary: If set to true, this progress bar will have a striped texture.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ProgressBar.IsAnimated
member.summary: If set to true, any stripe will be animated.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ProgressBar.MinValue
member.summary: The minimum value represented by the progress bar. This must be less than both and .

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ProgressBar.MaxValue
member.summary: The maximum value represented by the progress bar. This must be greater than both and .

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ProgressBar.Value
member.summary: The current value represented by the progress bar. This must fall between and .

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ProgressBar.ShowPercentage
member.summary: Set this to true if you want to show the percentage as text inside the bar.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ShadowSize
member.summary: Defines different shadow sizes for components.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Spacing
member.summary: Defines different spacing values for components.
member.remarks: The members of this enumeration correspond to one of the supported size values.

member.summary: The callback that is triggered when the toast is about to hide.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Toast.ShowHideButton
member.summary: Specifies whether the hide button is shown in the header of the toast.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Toast.ShowOnRender
member.summary: Specifies whether to show the toast immediately when rendered without having to separately invoke the method.

member.summary: Triggers the callback.
